title: Strengthening Citi's Policies and Practices to Become an Anti-Racist Institution
tag-1: Strengthening Citi's Policies and Practices to Become an Anti-Racist Institution
tag-2: Advancing racial equity requires a more intentional focus on the challenges faced by communities of color and a commitment to becoming an anti-racist institution. Citi is taking a hard look at its own policies and practices to actively identify potential bias to help level the playing field for communities of color.
